fieldMap.label: Field mapping
fieldMap.helpText: Build a JSON object. The object should be in the format option_value: [array of field ids' to act on] for example: {'cat':[21875871,21865183,21745801], 'dog':[22103126,21613267], 'dolphin': [280865, 20295661], 'the_fish': []}

error.title: An error occurred
error.message: Please try the previous action again.
error.data: Ticket data could not be read.
